snippet: The Democratic National Convention culminates Thursday night with President Obama's acceptance speech, and The Times's political unit will be broadcasting live from Charlotte, beginning at 7 p.m. Eastern time. Here are a few program highlights.
abstract: The Democratic National Convention culminates Thursday night with President Obama's acceptance speech, and The Times's political unit will be broadcasting live from Charlotte, beginning at 7 p.m. Eastern time. Here are a few program highlights.

headline.main: TimesCast Politics and Democratic Convention Schedule at a Glance
